name: Mini Molten Firestorm
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Infinite Molten Berserker Tonic
description: Double-click to drink, transforming you into a Molten berserker for 5 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Recipe: Infinite Molten Berserker Tonic
description: Double-click to learn how to make the Infinite Molten Berserker Tonic.

name: Decorative Molten Jetpack
description: Double-click to imbue another back-slot item's stats into this appearance (one-time use).

name: Fused Gauntlet Ticket
description: Double-click to summon a vendor for 5 minutes, allowing you to purchase your choice of Fused Gauntlets. This ticket is the currency to obtain the item. Reusable until the ticket is exchanged.

name: Sclerite Karka Shell
description: <c=@flavor>The karka have mysterious biological properties.</c>

name: Potion Of Karka Slaying
description: <c=@flavor>Developed by the Consortium for the good of all.</c>

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
+8% Damage vs. Karka
-6% Damage from Karka
+10% Experience from Kills

name: Potion Of Karka Toughness
description: <c=@flavor>Developed by the Consortium for the good of all.</c>
